values: n. a feeling of closeness and understanding that someone has for another person because of their similar qualities, ideas, or interests 紧密联系
n. likeness based on relationship or causal connection 类同
n. liking for or an attraction to something 吸引力
a natural liking for or attraction to a person, thing, idea
